content: निष्ठुर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नि-स्था-उरच् षत्वटुत्वे] {@--1@} Hard, rugged, coarse, rough. {@--2@} Severe, sharp, smart (as a bow); <ls>Śi. 5. 49.</ls> {@--3@} Cruel, harsh, hard-hearted (said of persons or things); व्यवसायः प्रतिपत्तिनिष्ठुरः <ls>R. 8. 65.</ls> <ls n="R.">3. 62.</ls> {@--4@} Motionless, stiff. {@--5@} Contumelious. --रं A harsh speech, abusive language.
